Track calories, food, and macros with ease! MyNetDiary has a free barcode scanner, personal diet plans, and AI Meal Scan for instant logging â€” all in a smart, simple-to-use app. USERS SAYâ€¦ The best Love this app! The best out of many food tracking apps that I have tried over the years. Love that it is free! The breakdown of the meal and daily nutrition is very informative. Try it you will love it! LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS APP Best app for tracking food, exercise! Consistently losing weight! I love how it shows you if you're on target for your goal. Great layout, great look, easy to use!!! I highly recommend this app if you're looking to be a healthier you!!! Fast, intuitive, user friendly I have tried other calorie tracking programs over the years and this app is by far the best I've come across. I highly recommend it. The free version is very good and I am now enjoying the extra functions through a paid subscription. RECOGNIZED EXCELLENCE â€¢ Ranked #1 in Forbes Healthâ€™s Best Weight Loss Apps of 2025. â€¢ Rated #1 by the American Journal of Preventive Medicine. â€¢ Praised by The New York Times as â€œsimpler, quicker, and better-lookingâ€ than other apps. â€¢ Featured in Todayâ€™s Dietitian, alongside WW and Noom. DIFFERENT FROM OTHER DIET APPS â€¢ Simple & Generous Features: Packed with free tools, no ads. â€¢ Lightning-Fast Logging: Barcode scanner and AI Meal Scan make tracking effortless. â€¢ Verified Food Database: Over 1.7 million items with 108 nutrients for accuracy. â€¢ Privacy Focused: No account required. MyNetDiary puts you in control. You can pick a diet or a meal plan, follow our registered dietitians' easy tips, and follow the app's guidance. Or, you can turn them off and simply use MyNetDiary as the best free calorie-counting app in the world. PROVEN SUCCESS â€¢ Active members lose an average of 1.4 lbs/week â€¢ Over 25 million users have chosen MyNetDiary, many switched from other diet apps A few of the free version features: â€¢ Easy food, exercise, and water tracking. â€¢ Daily coaching tips and meal reminders. â€¢ Customizable dashboard for your goals. â€¢ iOS Health integration and Apple Watch support. â€¢ Shopping lists, nutrition articles, and how-to videos. SPECIAL PRO APP FEATURES â€¢ Up to 108 nutrients tracked â€¢ Plan macros â€¢ Full set of charts â€¢ Timestamps â€¢ Carb tracking If you need more support, MyNetDiary Premium provides all the guidance and features you may need. At your fingertips, you'll find: â€¢ Premium Diets, 600+ full-flavored Premium Recipes and Menus by RDs, including low-carb, keto, high-protein, Mediterranean, vegetarian, and more - with diet planners, guides, and feedback. â€¢ Intermittent fasting - full-featured, with fasting timer and different protocols. â€¢ Macros planning and cycling. â€¢ Planning and tracking up to 108 nutrients, including omegas and aminos. â€¢ Recipe import tool - easily load internet recipes and calculate complete nutrition. â€¢ Integrations with top fitness trackers - Fitbit, Garmin, and Withings. â€¢ In-depth reporting and analysis tools to improve your diet. LUCH Films is a modern app for giving images the effect of film photography. Try unique bokeh effects, light leaks, noise and dust effects, and original filters. 20+ HANDMADE FILTERS The application has over 20 different filters made by hand by a professional photographer. They are universal and made for various kinds of photos and colors, imitating the effects film KODAK and ILFORD. FILM FRAMES FOR INSTAGRAM STORY AND FEED We have adapted film frames for modern screen formats and added them to the application so that the warmth of film photography will always remain in our hearts and minds. DUST EFFECT Making a shabby photo is easy. You don't have to wait 20 years, you just have to choose one of 35 effects. LIGHT LEAKS You know these old light leaks shots that we loved to look at as children. We simulated the same light flashes in the LUCH FILMS. BOKEH EFFECT If you love bokeh as much as we do, then you should definitely love it. Choose from 35 bokeh and prism effects. NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS, NO IN-APP PURCHASES Take full control over your image, apply unique filters developed in collaboration with photographers. Create unique photos including new layers. Over 90 effects. The ability to apply noise and dust effects, light leaks, bokeh and prism effects to the image. You can choose the size of the image for a stream or story, which is ideal for Instagram or other social networks. Film frames are also included in the LUCH Films. Follow @luchfilmsapp on Instagram for inspiration from our community of users. We love hearing your ideas and feedback. Please email hello@vostokapp.ru or DM us on Instagram at @luchfilmsapp for questions or suggestions.

Track calories, food, and macros with ease! MyNetDiary has a free barcode scanner, personal diet plans, and AI Meal Scan for instant logging â€” all in a smart, simple-to-use app. USERS SAYâ€¦ The best Love this app! The best out of many food tracking apps that I have tried over the years. Love that it is free! The breakdown of the meal and daily nutrition is very informative. Try it you will love it! LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS APP Best app for tracking food, exercise! Consistently losing weight! I love how it shows you if you're on target for your goal. Great layout, great look, easy to use!!! I highly recommend this app if you're looking to be a healthier you!!! Fast, intuitive, user friendly I have tried other calorie tracking programs over the years and this app is by far the best I've come across. I highly recommend it. The free version is very good and I am now enjoying the extra functions through a paid subscription. RECOGNIZED EXCELLENCE â€¢ Ranked #1 in Forbes Healthâ€™s Best Weight Loss Apps of 2025. â€¢ Rated #1 by the American Journal of Preventive Medicine. â€¢ Praised by The New York Times as â€œsimpler, quicker, and better-lookingâ€ than other apps. â€¢ Featured in Todayâ€™s Dietitian, alongside WW and Noom. DIFFERENT FROM OTHER DIET APPS â€¢ Simple & Generous Features: Packed with free tools, no ads. â€¢ Lightning-Fast Logging: Barcode scanner and AI Meal Scan make tracking effortless. â€¢ Verified Food Database: Over 1.7 million items with 108 nutrients for accuracy. â€¢ Privacy Focused: No account required. MyNetDiary puts you in control. You can pick a diet or a meal plan, follow our registered dietitians' easy tips, and follow the app's guidance. Or, you can turn them off and simply use MyNetDiary as the best free calorie-counting app in the world. PROVEN SUCCESS â€¢ Active members lose an average of 1.4 lbs/week â€¢ Over 25 million users have chosen MyNetDiary, many switched from other diet apps A few of the free version features: â€¢ Easy food, exercise, and water tracking. â€¢ Daily coaching tips and meal reminders. â€¢ Customizable dashboard for your goals. â€¢ iOS Health integration and Apple Watch support. â€¢ Shopping lists, nutrition articles, and how-to videos. SPECIAL PRO APP FEATURES â€¢ Up to 108 nutrients tracked â€¢ Plan macros â€¢ Full set of charts â€¢ Timestamps â€¢ Carb tracking If you need more support, MyNetDiary Premium provides all the guidance and features you may need. At your fingertips, you'll find: â€¢ Premium Diets, 600+ full-flavored Premium Recipes and Menus by RDs, including low-carb, keto, high-protein, Mediterranean, vegetarian, and more - with diet planners, guides, and feedback. â€¢ Intermittent fasting - full-featured, with fasting timer and different protocols. â€¢ Macros planning and cycling. â€¢ Planning and tracking up to 108 nutrients, including omegas and aminos. â€¢ Recipe import tool - easily load internet recipes and calculate complete nutrition. â€¢ Integrations with top fitness trackers - Fitbit, Garmin, and Withings. â€¢ In-depth reporting and analysis tools to improve your diet. Subscription Terms: The subscription period will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. To turn this function off, turn off auto-renew in your iTunes account. Renewal payments will differ depending on subscription and pricing at the time of renewal. Your iTunes account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. Privacy Policy: www.mynetdiary.com/privacy.html Terms of Use: www.mynetdiary.com/terms.html
